p: A lingering criticism of plant-based production platforms has been the absence of approved human products in the USA after 25 years of active research and development [ 125]. Excitingly, this last barrier has been overcome by the recent approval of a plant-produced glucocerebrosidase (commercial name: ELEYSO TM) by the FDA for treating Gaucher disease, heralding a new era in the field of plant-made pharmaceutics [ 31]. We speculate that plant-based production systems will offer a superior scalability, safety, time and cost-saving benefits for NoV VLP manufacturing.
